original_title: Entre Guerra y Guerra - ¡Afuera la Bicicleta!
overview: Roque has been asked to take care of Tala's garden over the weekend, when suddenly Tala's garden is taken over by other kids who are new in the block. Roque en Los Pecosos embark a journey to get Tala's garden back before she comes back.
title: Entre Guerra y Guerra - ¡Afuera la Bicicleta!
